sentences.sentence: A review of concepts, basic equitation and analytic models of two phases fluid.
sentences.translation: 介绍了两相流的基本概念、两相流的基本方程及解析模型基本方程。

sentences.sentence: Weekly riding, grooming, tacking up and equitation theory classes will develop wholly rounded riders while the rest of the course makes it unique amongst riding offerings in China.
sentences.translation: 每周马术课程内容，包括备马、梳理、马术理论课、并安排学员们在国内进行骑马训练，将有助于培养出全面多元化骑手。

sentences.sentence: The teaching of equitation and toxophily, which took it as its tenet to uphold the rule of Qing Dynasty, is an important contents in the history of Suolun tribe of the "Eight Banners".
sentences.translation: 以维护清王朝统治为宗旨的骑射教育，是清代八旗索伦历史活动的重要内容。
